mapper.insert: insert into member ( memid, mememail, mempass, memcancelflag, memimg, memauth, memnm, memintro, memlang, memtel, memperiod, menindt, memblackflag, memEmailDiv ) values ( #{memId}, #{memMail}, #{memPass}, 'F', #{memImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'F', #{memNm}, #{memIntro, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memLang}, #{memTel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memPeriod, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, 'F', #{memEmailDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from member where memid like '%'||#{memId}||'%'
select * from member where memNm like '%'||#{memNm}||'%' and memTel =#{memTel}
select * from ( select a.*, rownum rn from (select member.* from member order by memId) a where memauth='F') a where rn between ((#{pageNo}-1)*10)+1 and (#{pageNo})*10
select count(*) from member where memauth='F'
